Sentencas: In order to evaluate the compatibility between the SOFC(Solid Oxide Fuel Cells) interconnector material of the perovskite-type La0.7Ca0.3Cr1-yCoyO3 (y=0.05, 0.1 and 0.2) and 8mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 (YSZ), two types of experiments were carried out in air.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: One was by the reaction of powder mixtures.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: The reaction products were identified by X-ray analysis after heating at 1000-1300 degrees C.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: The other was the experiments using diffusion couples.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: The distribution of elements at the interface was observed by EPMA for the couples heated at 1300 degrees C and 1400 degrees C.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: The reaction progressed mainly by the dissolusion of calcium ions from the perovskite phase into YSZ.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: In the perovskite phase, due to the loss of A-site Ca ion, the activity of B-site ions increased, resulting in the deposition of the spinel-type CoCr2O4.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: The excess amount of calcium ions incorporated in YSZ reacted ZrO2 to form CaZrO3.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: Increase of cobalt content enlarge the reactivity of the perovskite phase with YSZ.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: The parabolic rate constant of the reaction, k(p), was determined by the thickness of CaZrO3 at the interface of the diffusion couples.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: Calculated k(p) were 2.9 x 10(-12)cm(2)sec(-1) and 2.1 x 10(-11)cm(2)sec(-1) at 1300 degrees C and 1400 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2

Sentencas: For the practical application as the SOFC interconnector material, the content of cobalt as a sintering accelerator in (La, Ca)CrO3 must be controlled at low level to keep the chemical interaction to a minimum.
Titulo: CHEMICAL COMPATIBILITY OF PEROVSKITE-TYPE OXIDE LA0.7CA0.3CR1-YCOYO3 WITH Y2O3 STABILIZED ZRO2
